snippet.title: K.S.-n-Kickin: The Kinder Surprise Game
snippet.description:
K.S.-n-Kickin was a game released by Artworld UK as a giveaway in 1999. The game itself is based heavily on Gubble 2 by Actual Entertainment (released in 1998), featuring the same levels from the base game, with redone artwork across the board, including replacing the enemies with Kinder Surprise toys from the era and replacing the main character with the Kinder Surprise mascot Kinderino

Back in 2011, I originally posted a Let's Play series with commentary as the first gameplay footage of this game. Since then, the videos have not aged well both in terms of video & audio quality and no other footage of the game has surfaced

This upload is meant to document the game in it's native 480p quality. Any performance oddities likely stems from Shadowplay. Originally a link to the disk image was added to the videos, however a new image will need to be made due to a potentially corrupt installer. This will  be updated when a download link is ready
